sentence.Network_en: The pregnant woman needed to breathe deeply when her heart was beating with such fierceness.
sentence.Network_cn: 当这位孕妇的心如此猛烈地跳动时,她需要做深呼吸.

sentence.Network_en: These was the tensity of fierceness in the man's plea.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个家伙的哀求坚执而又猛烈.

sentence.Network_en: There was the tensity of fierceness in the man's plea which appealed deeply to her sympathies.
sentence.Network_cn: 这人的请求如此强烈,深深激起了嘉莉的同情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一个盟军军官认为(青年师)在战斗中所表现出来的坚韧和强烈(fierceness)是他在整个欧洲战场从未见到过的。几天后,冯·龙德施德特元帅在与“塞普”迪特里希和库尔特.
